意大利正准备在周二告别前总理西尔维奥贝卢斯科尼，这位丑闻频发的亿万富翁至少统治了该国的政治、商业和足球世界 30 年。

贝卢斯科尼于周一去世，享年 86 岁，这是他再次入住米兰圣拉斐尔医院三天后，也就是他被证实长期患有白血病两个月后。

“没有贝卢斯科尼的意大利，”该国发行量最大的报纸 Corriere della Sera 在其头版写道，并用 30 多页的篇幅报道了此次活动。

没有给出正式的死因，但 Corriere 发布了贝卢斯科尼去世的消息，称他死于白血病，他的病情在周一晚上突然恶化。

除了四次担任意大利总理外，贝卢斯科尼还拥有一个商业帝国，包括 MFE (MFEB.MI)媒体集团，以及 1986 年至 2017 年的 AC 米兰足球俱乐部和 2018 年的 AC 蒙扎足球俱乐部。

科里埃说，贝卢斯科尼身体状况良好，可以在电视上观看周六国际米兰和曼城之间的欧洲冠军联赛决赛。总理乔治亚·梅洛尼 (Giorgia Meloni) 周一在接受电视采访时表示，她当天与他进行了“详细”交谈。

在周三米兰大教堂举行的国葬之前，家人和密友在他别墅的私人守灵仪式上表示敬意，可能会吸引数万人。

外交部长安东尼奥·塔亚尼 (Antonio Tajani) 缩短了对华盛顿的访问，他是预计会表达敬意的人之一。塔亚尼是贝卢斯科尼领导的意大利力量党的副领导人，该党现在正处于崩溃的危险之中。

“我希望 Forza Italia 能有一个未来，但坦率地说，我看不到未来，”前部长兼党员朱利亚诺·乌尔巴尼 (Giuliano Urbani) 告诉 La Repubblica daily，并指出其大多数选民已经转而效忠 Meloni 的意大利兄弟党。

梅洛尼和总统塞尔吉奥·马塔雷拉 (Sergio Mattarella) 是参加葬礼的人之一，葬礼将在全国哀悼日举行，所有公共建筑都降半旗致哀。

周二，印度当局开始从西部沿海地区疏散人员，四名男孩在孟买冒险进入波涛汹涌的大海后溺水身亡，两天后，一场强大的飓风接近古吉拉特邦和邻近的巴基斯坦南部。

Biparjoy 被归类为非常严重的气旋风暴，预计将于周四晚上在印度古吉拉特邦的 Mandvi 和巴基斯坦的卡拉奇之间登陆，最大持续风速为每小时 125-135 公里（78-84 英里），阵风可达 150 公里（ 93 英里）每小时，印度气象部门（IMD）表示。

位于古吉拉特邦南部的印度西部大都市孟买的一名警官说：“周一晚上，四名男孩在 Juhu 海滩溺水身亡。到目前为止，我们已经找到了其中两人的尸体，仍在继续寻找其余两人的下落。” .

当局说，阿拉伯海的巨浪伴随着倾盆大雨和狂风袭击了古吉拉特邦的沿海地区，树木被连根拔起，并导致墙壁倒塌，导致该州卡奇和拉杰果德地区的三人死亡。

州政府表示，预计古吉拉特邦沿海的八个地区将受到影响。该地区的捕鱼活动已暂停至周五，而学校已宣布放假。

古吉拉特邦是该国许多海上石油设施和主要港口的所在地，其中大部分被迫暂停运营。

据古吉拉特邦政府称，21支国家救灾部队和13支邦救灾部队已部署到该邦开展救援工作。

“我们已经开始从沿海地区撤离。到目前为止，已有 7,000 多人被疏散，预计人数将超过 5 万至 6 万人，”该州高级官员卡迈勒·达亚尼 (Kamal Dayani) 说。

邦政府表示，印度最大的两个港口——位于古吉拉特邦的坎德拉和蒙德拉已暂停运营。据航运消息人士称，贝迪、纳夫拉基、博尔班达尔、奥卡、皮帕瓦夫和巴夫纳加尔等其他港口也因飓风而关闭。

贸易商称，在古吉拉特邦的贾姆讷格尔经营着世界上最大的炼油厂的信实工业公司(RELI.NS)宣布发生不可抗力，由于风暴，古吉拉特邦锡卡港的柴油和其他石油产品将暂停出口。

Adani 企业集团的港口业务 Adani Ports (APSE.NS)表示，周一暂停了印度最大的商业港口蒙德拉和坎德拉附近的金枪鱼港口的船舶运营，蒙德拉是印度最大的商业港口，拥有该国最大的煤炭进口码头。

印度海岸警卫队表示，已从古吉拉特邦海岸名为 Key Singapore 的自升式石油钻井平台疏散了 50 名人员，该钻井平台由总部位于迪拜的 Shelf Drilling (SHLF.OL)所有，目前为 Cairn Oil & Gas (Vedanta Ltd.) 工作。 (VDAN.NS) ，根据 Shelf Drilling 的网站。

在巴基斯坦，国家灾害管理局表示正在指示在可能受影响的南部和东南部地区采取预防措施。

周二公布的数据显示，在截至 4 月的三个月中，英国的劳动力市场看起来比预期的要强劲得多，这将加强对英国央行今年将继续加息的押注。

国家统计局表示，在截至 4 月的三个月中，不包括奖金的工资比去年同期高出 7.2%。

路透社调查的经济学家平均预测增长 6.9%。

作为回应，英镑兑美元汇率上涨约四分之一美分至 1.255 美元。

此前预计失业率将升至 4.0%，但在截至 4 月份的三个月中，失业率从截至 3 月份的三个月的 3.9% 降至 3.8%。

4 月份的数据首次包含了最低工资上涨 9.7% 的影响，英国央行将对其进行密切分析，以判断英国近期两位数通胀的影响有多持久。

英国央行官员可能会注意到，总体就业和工资数据高于所有预期，而失业率低于所有预期。

在周二公布数据之前，金融市场已经消化了到 12 月利率峰值将从目前的 4.5% 超过 5.5%，而最新数据的强劲可能会在格林威治标准时间 0630 开盘时进一步提高这些预测。

在截至 4 月的三个月中，就业人数增加了 250,000，而路透社调查的预测为增加 162,000。

据韩联社报道，韩国总统尹锡烈周二表示，在中国大使警告首尔不要在中美竞争中做出“错误赌注”之后，他怀疑中国大使是否有相互尊重的态度。

韩联社援引多位参加会议的人士的话报道，Yoon 在内阁会议上发表了上述评论。

上周，首尔外交部召见了大使邢海明，此前他指责韩国因美国的影响而导致双边关系恶化，并敦促该国停止与中国“脱钩”。

“从邢大使的态度来看，他是否具有作为外交官相互尊重或促进友谊的态度值得怀疑，”韩联社援引尹在会议上的话说。 “我们的人民对他的不当行为感到不满。”

当被问及情况时，中国外交部发言人汪文斌周五表示，当前中韩关系面临的挑战“不是中国造成的”。

Soo-hyang Choi 和 Hyonhee Shin 的报道 Ed Davies 编辑; Tue, 13 Jun 2023 05:55:34 GMT https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-koreas-yoon-questions-whether-china-envoy-showed-mutual-respect-yonhap-2023-06-13/ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-koreas-yoon-questions-whether-china-envoy-showed-mutual-respect-yonhap-2023-06-13/Reuters韩国中国/（更新 1） Taiwan civil defence handbook includes tips on identifying Chinese soldiers

台湾军方周二发布了更新后的民防手册，其中首次包括如何根据制服、迷彩和徽章来区分中国和台湾士兵的章节。

台湾去年在与北京的紧张关系加剧以及俄罗斯入侵乌克兰之后公布了这本手册，详细介绍了如何通过智能手机应用程序寻找防空洞、水和食物供应，以及准备紧急急救包的技巧。

台湾国防部表示，他们收到的反馈是，考虑到乌克兰的冲突，这本书需要更好地反映战争情景，俄罗斯称之为“特别行动”。

其中一项变化包括台湾服役人员和穿着中国军装的“敌军”的插图。

台湾士兵面带微笑，而中国士兵则低着嘴，表情严厉。

实际上很难区分他们，”国防总动员署署长沉伟志在国防部对记者说。

这本小册子假设中国士兵会穿人民解放军的军装；专家表示，特种部队在入侵台湾期间试图渗透时可能会穿着不同的装备。

台湾的紧急救援人员，包括警察和急救人员，也出现在新手册中，可供下载。

沉说，该机构正在进行英文翻译。

该手册的规划早于俄罗斯对其邻国的袭击，这引发了关于它对台湾的影响以及加强准备的方式的辩论，例如对预备役训练和延长兵役的改革。

尽管台北强烈反对，中国仍将民主治理的台湾视为自己的领土，并在过去三年中加大了军事和政治压力，以推动这些主权主张。

台湾也一直在检查防空洞以确保它们是合适的，并更新标志以便更容易找到；官员们在同一次新闻发布会上说，标记最终可能包括闪光灯。

在美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯 (Antony Blinken) 预期访华前几天，一个受到广泛关注的中国社交媒体账户指责华盛顿一再耍花招，制造它渴望与中国接触的“假象”。

虽然国务院尚未宣布，但一位美国官员表示，布林肯将于 6 月 18 日在中国进行会谈。

此次高级别、高风险访问的筹备工作因美国对中国从事间谍活动的新指控以及中国对华盛顿改善严重磨损的双边关系的诚意的严厉攻击而受到损害。

在疑似中国间谍气球飞越美国后，布林肯在 2 月取消了对北京的访问。在他本周出访的前几天，包括布林肯本人在内的美国官员表示，中国从古巴进行间谍活动已有一段时间，并于2019 年升级了那里的情报收集设施，北京和哈瓦那否认这一说法是假的。

周一，布林肯表示，中国在古巴的努力是北京扩大其海外存在的全球努力的一部分，自乔·拜登总统于 2021 年 1 月上台以来，美国为解决这一问题而采取的行动已经产生了“结果”，但没有具体说明这些结果是什么是。

“每次他们说要见面，美国都会发挥作用，制造一种它渴望沟通的假象，同时反复试探和挑衅中国的基本原则，”附属社交媒体用户 Yuyuan Tantian 说。与中国国家广播公司中央电视台合作，周二在一篇在线文章中写道。

年初的热气球事件纯属“闹剧”， 美国国防部长本月早些时候提出与中国防长会面的要求被拒绝，不过是“精心策划”的表演。

周二，一名男子在美国驻香港领事馆的墙壁和大门上喷洒了反美涂鸦，凸显了布林肯访问的负面情绪。

当地电视画面显示英文中的“霸权”一词和简体中文中的“双重标准”一词，这些词在中国大陆使用，而不是在中国统治的城市中常见的繁体字。

中国官方小报《环球时报》周日在一篇社论中写道：“由于美国一再强调需要加强与中国的高层沟通，布林肯是否会访华是对美国诚意和政治操纵能力的试金石。”

乌克兰官员周二早些时候表示，俄罗斯连夜对乌克兰中部城市克里维罗伊发动“大规模导弹”袭击，造成人员伤亡，民用基础设施遭到破坏。

Kryvyi Rih 所在的第聂伯罗彼得罗夫斯克州州长 Serhiy Lisak 在 Telegram 消息应用程序上说：“有人死伤。” “对 Kryvyi Rih 的大规模导弹袭击。”

周二凌晨，空袭警报响彻整个乌克兰，基辅军方官员表示，防空部队摧毁了所有瞄准乌克兰首都的俄罗斯导弹。

乌克兰最高军事指挥部表示，空军摧毁了俄罗斯向乌克兰发射的 14 枚巡航导弹中的 10 枚，以及四架伊朗制造的无人机中的一架。

目前尚不清楚有多少枚导弹击中了 Kryvyi Rih，以及俄罗斯发射的无人机击中了目标。

该市市长 Oleksandr Vilkul 早些时候表示，在 Kryvyi Rih，几座民用建筑遭到袭击，其中包括一栋五层楼。

“可能有人在废墟下，”维尔库尔在电报上说。

路透社无法独立核实该报道。 Vilkul 没有提供任何进一步的细节。

Lisak 发布了一张五层公寓楼的照片，所有窗户都被炸毁，一些窗户冒出浓烟。

俄罗斯没有立即对报道的袭击事件发表评论。俄罗斯和乌克兰都否认在近 16 个月前俄罗斯对其邻国发动的战争中以平民为目标。

乌克兰东部城市哈尔科夫市的市长在他的电报频道上说，俄罗斯无人机袭击了那里的民用基础设施，袭击了一个仓库和一家公用事业公司的大楼。没有关于人员伤亡的即时信息。

Valentyn Origenko、Serhiy Karazy 和 Lidia Kelly 的报道；Lidia Kelly 在墨尔本撰写； Simon Cameron-Moore 编辑; Tue, 13 Jun 2023 04:39:11 GMT https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/russia-launches-massive-missile-attack-kryvyi-rih-central-ukraine-officials-2023-06-13/ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/russia-launches-massive-missile-attack-kryvyi-rih-central-ukraine-officials-2023-06-13/Reuters乌克兰危机/袭击KRYVYI RIH（更新 2，电视） As climate change hits, China weighs new water megaprojectsSummary:
  • 随着气候风险的增加，中国表示用水支出激增
  • 2022年水务投资增长44%；今年第一季度15%
  • 需求方措施可能更有效——专家

随着干旱的临近，中国正在规划雄心勃勃的新水利基础设施项目，希望将更多宝贵的液体输送到全国各地以减轻气候变化的影响——但专家警告说，更多的河流改道可能代价高昂。

5 月底，官员们发布了建设由新运河、水库和蓄水设施组成的全国“供水网络”的计划，他们表示这将促进灌溉，并降低洪水和干旱的风险。

水利部部长李国英表示，该计划将在 2035 年之前“疏通水系大动脉”，提高国家均衡供水的能力。

但专家表示，这种方法不仅成本高昂且破坏环境，而且可能使南部地区更容易受到供应中断的影响，需要额外的基础设施来解决。

墨尔本大学研究中国水利基础设施影响的地理学家 Mark Wang 说：“到目前为止，他们一直在做的是使用工程解决方案来尝试物理供水并解决他们的水问题。” “如果中国能够减少用水并提高效率，就不需要大型引水工程。”

中国水利部没有回应置评请求。

虽然今年的干旱预计不会像去年那么严重，但长江流域的大部分地区都经历了数月的高温，国家预报员警告说，中国中部和西南部可能会受到影响。

西南部分地区已经采取了特殊措施，四川省凉山县的一家自来水公司敦促居民每月淋浴不要超过四次。

中国人均水资源占有量远低于世界平均水平，且分布不均。长期以来，它一直依赖大型基础设施将水从洪水多发的南部输送到干旱的北部，并找到解决长期供水问题的工程解决方案。

一些抑制需求的措施已经到位。地方政府已被迫减少用水量、改善废水回收和解决污染问题。

王补充说，除此之外，中国在过去五年中开展了 100 多个引水项目。

分析师表示，去年固定水务资产总投资超过 1.1 万亿元人民币（1540 亿美元），比 2021 年增长 44%。 2023 年第一季度增长 15.6% 至 4070 亿元人民币，官方表示将提供更多资金。

“建设这些庞大项目的成本可能会继续增加，”牛津全球协会研究中国水资源问题的研究员 Genevieve Donnellon-May 说。

“连锁反应”

新计划的一部分涉及南水北调工程 (SNWDP) 的扩建，这是一项雄心勃勃的工程项目，旨在将长江过剩的水调至北部干旱的黄河流域。

政府表示，该项目在“优化”中国的供水方面发挥了重要作用，已分流超过 600 亿立方米的水。

但正如该项目的名称所暗示的那样，水流的方向只有一个方向，在去年的干旱期间它无能为力。

通过依赖如此规模的额外项目，专家们担心中国只会转移短缺。墨尔本大学的 Wang 说，他们说 SNWDP 和三峡大坝等大型项目引发了不可预见后果的“连锁反应”，需要数十亿元人民币的新基础设施来修复。

例如，通过丹江口水库向北调水已经耗尽了汉江下游的水，迫使当局提出另一个 600 亿元人民币的项目，将丹江口与三峡水库连接起来。

三峡封存了多达 400 亿立方米的长江水用于发电和防洪，其本身也因鄱阳湖水位创历史新低而受到指责。为了解决这个问题，当局正在考虑建造一个新的水闸的计划，批评人士说这会破坏当地的栖息地。

中国还提出了一项将水从西藏调到中国西北部的项目，这引起了印度和其他依赖雅鲁藏布江和湄公河等河流的国家的警觉。

Wang 说，专注于废水回收、海水淡化或减少需求的替代方法可能会更有效。

他说，中国约 60% 的供水用于农业，可以通过改种作物或使用替代灌溉方法来提高效率。

“对于一些工程解决方案——如果它们是可行的，如果对当地环境的影响不是很大，我并不完全反对它们，”王说。 “但规模、范围和影响是巨大的……如果你在需求方面付出同样的努力并能取得更好的结果，这就是重点。”

  • Water levels drop at Kakhovka reservoir after dam destroyed
  • S-300 missile retrieved from water as reservoir drains
  • Online video showed remains of Nazi German soldiers

The draining of one of Europe's largest reservoirs as a result of the destruction of the Kakhovka dam has revealed submerged military objects that offer a reminder of wars past and present on Ukrainian soil.

On a drizzly morning near the southern city of Zaporizhzhia, a team of divers and underwater demining experts from Ukraine's State Emergency service grappled on Monday with the steering element of a S-300 missile. It had fallen in the water since Russia's full-scale invasion and was caked in algae and soil.

The missile fragment had been spotted in shallow water on Saturday by a local resident taking a stroll on the newly formed beach. The demining team's leader, Oleksandr Chechko, said the water level at the location had fallen by around four metres.

He said the amount of explosive or dangerous items the unit had been called out to deal with had grown several times since the Kakhovka dam was destroyed last Monday.

Ukraine's environment minister said the Kakhovka reservoir, which was the body of water contained by the dam, had lost nearly three-quarters of its volume.

Before the disaster, the reservoir contained 18 cubic kilometres (4.3 cubic miles) of water.

Each side blames the other for the dam's destruction last week, but evidence is growing that there was an explosion at the dam around the time it collapsed, according to Ukrainian and US intelligence reports and seismic data from Norway. Russia was in control of the dam when it was destroyed.

The S-300, used by both Russia and Ukraine, is a Soviet-era missile built to intercept aerial targets, such as larger missiles. Russia also uses modified S-300s to hit ground targets in Ukraine. It was not clear which side had launched the recovered missile.

REMNANTS OF A PAST WAR

Chechko said the explosive detritus from the war with Russia was not the only thing exposed by the lower water level, as the dam's destruction had exposed reminders of earlier wars.

"We often recover remnants of S-300 rockets, remnants of Smerch rockets, and after the water (level) fell we are finding munitions from World War Two," he said.

Ukrainian news agency UNIAN posted a video on Sunday showing human remains on the dried-up reservoir bed which it said were from World War Two. One of the decomposing skulls was wearing a helmet similar to those worn by Nazi Germany's soldiers.

Much of southern Ukraine, including the area around the drained reservoir, saw vicious battles in World War Two between the Soviet and German armies. Ukraine says 8 million of its people were killed in that war, a significant part of the Soviet Union's total losses.

The destruction of the Kakhovka dam has provided other historical echoes: In 1941, retreating Soviet forces blew up Zaporizhzhia's huge Dnipro Dam to slow a German assault.

A storm off India's west coast has strengthened to become a powerful cyclone and could hit India's western state of Gujarat and southern parts of Pakistan this week, the Indian weather department said on Monday.

The cyclone, named Biparjoy, is expected to make landfall on Thursday afternoon between Mandvi in Gujarat and Karachi in Pakistan with maximum sustained wind speed of 125-135 km (78-84 miles) per hour, gusting to 150 km (93 miles) per hour, the India Meteorological Department (IMD) said.

Nearly a dozen districts in coastal Gujarat will be affected by heavy rainfall and gusting winds although some of these are sparsely populated, which would limit the damage, said a weather office official, who declined to be named.

Fishermen in Gujarat have been advised against going to sea and those at sea have been called back, with 21,000 boats parked so far, the government said on Monday.

Offshore oil installations have also been asked to ensure immediate return of all manpower, and two of India's largest ports - Kandla and Mundra - located in Gujarat have been alerted while other ports have been advised for preventive action.

The Adani conglomerate's ports business, Adani Ports (APSE.NS) , said in an exchange filing that it suspended its vessel operations on Monday at Mundra, India's biggest commercial port that has the country's largest coal import terminal, and also at Tuna port near Kandla.

The Indian Coast Guard said it was evacuating 50 personnel from a jack-up oil rig off Gujarat's coast named Key Singapore, which is owned by Dubai-based Shelf Drilling (SHLF.OL) and currently working for Cairn Oil & Gas (Vedanta Ltd.) (VDAN.NS) , according to Shelf Drilling's website.

Shelf Drilling and Cairn Oil & Gas did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

Gujarat Pipavav Port Limited said in a stock exchange filing on Monday that operations at its Pipavav Port had been suspended since late Saturday evening due to "prevailing severe weather conditions".

Ten teams of the State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) and 12 of the National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) have been deployed in Gujarat, the government said, with three more NDRF teams on standby and another 15 ready to be airlifted from other states on short notice.

"Rescue and relief teams of the Coast Guard, Army and Navy along with ships and aircraft have been kept ready on standby," it said.

In neighbouring Pakistan, the National Disaster Management Authority said instructions were being given to take precautionary measures in southern and southeastern parts that may be affected.

"Its (cyclone's) evolving impact will only be certain with further development of the situation," the authority said.

Ukraine said on Monday its troops had recaptured a fourth village from Russian forces in a cluster of settlements in the southeast, a day after reporting the first small gains of its long-anticipated counteroffensive.

The task of ending Moscow's occupation of southern and eastern Ukraine is daunting, given Russia's numerical superiority in men, ammunition and air power, and the many months it has had to build defensive fortifications.

Kyiv said on Sunday its forces had liberated three villages - Blahodatne, Neskuchne and Makarivka - and on Monday, soldiers were seen in video holding up the Ukrainian flag in nearby Storozheve. Reuters confirmed the location of the footage.

The defence minister thanked the 35th Separate Brigade of Marines for regaining control of the village.

Ukraine's capture of the four villages in a matter of days is already its most rapid advance for seven months, though still short of a major breakthrough of Russia's deep defensive lines.

The claimed advance adds up to just five km (three miles) in total, still some 90 km (55 miles) from the Azov Sea coast and the interim prize of cutting Russia's "land bridge" to Crimea, the peninsula Moscow seized from Ukraine in 2014.

Moscow has yet to officially acknowledge any Ukrainian advances, saying last week that it had repelled numerous attacks and inflicted heavy casualties on Ukraine's forces. Unverified footage has circulated on social media of destroyed American and German armoured vehicles.

However, some prominent Russian military bloggers indicated that Ukrainian forces had taken Blahodatne and Neskuchne, although they said fighting for Makarivka was continuing.

It is almost certainly far too early to draw conclusions about the fate of the counteroffensive from early skirmishes that may be more about testing Russian defences than pursuing a major advance.

The US-based Institute for the Study of War said Ukraine was attempting "an extraordinarily difficult tactical operation – a frontal assault against prepared defensive positions, further complicated by a lack of air superiority – and these initial assaults should not be extrapolated to predict all Ukrainian operations".

Ben Hodges, a former commander of US forces in Europe, wrote that the main attack, when it came, would be expected to feature several hundred tanks and infantry fighting vehicles.

"The offensive has clearly started, but not I think the main attack," he wrote in an article for the Washington-based Center for European Policy Analysis.

"When we see large, armoured formations join the assault, then I think we'll know the main attack has really begun."

Russia has yet to face this kind of onslaught, but its unconvincing battlefield performance in the 15 months since its full-scale invasion has led to frequent changes of command and public arguments with the private militias called in to fight alongside regular soldiers.

There are signs that Moscow is now seeking to impose stronger central control, with an order that all so-called "volunteer units" should sign contracts by July 1 bringing them under the Defence Ministry.

Residents in the northeastern US were told to expect a brutal morning commute on Monday after a tanker truck fire caused an overpass collapse on a main highway.

A section of Interstate 95 was closed in both directions in Philadelphia on Sunday after the tanker trunk carrying gasoline caught fire for reasons that were not yet clear. No deaths or injuries had been reported by late Sunday.

Officials said it would take several months to rebuild the stretch of the main north-south interstate on the East Coast, running from Miami to the Canadian border in the state of Maine.

The US National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) said the tanker was carrying gasoline and that it had sent a team to investigate.

Andy Herrmann, a past president of the American Society of Civil Engineers, said bridges are not designed to withstand the heat from a tanker truck fire, which could be upward of 2,000 degrees Fahrenheit, and that such incidents were not common.
